TopicTitle: Interplanetary Expedition Team in Harder 3x Scaled Kerbol System

Articles.Content:
So I've decided to reboot my Save, but instead of logging every SINGLE mission, I'll just post firsts, or significant achievements. The decision to do this is it got too tedious to really post that many pics on a save that would have hundreds of missions. I must stress though, This is HEAVILY modded and WILL NOT load in 32bit.

My usual rules apply, no over the top Reaction Wheels, limited to roll only, 110% heating, 40% funds, 100% science, no reverting because I screwed up the launch, landing, ect. Quickloading is for bugs only. I will start out with lvl3 buildings because I REALLY dislike that mechanic, and instead take a hit to the funding (hence 40% funds). Realism overhauls are installed, FAR, Remote-Tech, RealHeat, RealFuels, ect.

Goals is to visit every body at least once, crewed.

Mod list

To start you guys off, the R3 Strato Rocket. After a few sounding rockets using heavy and inefficient Solid Rocket fuel, a new, lighter rocket was devised. The R3. Designed to be the first orbiting satellite around Kerbin.

Launching at dawn.

 

Kerbol appearing just above the horizon.

 

Climbing into orbit.

 

Burning mostly horizontal now to achieve orbital speeds.

majestetic pictures ! wow looks great mate !

cheers
